name: Jetpack Ride
description:
This game was part of a Game Dev Challenge and it was made in under 6 hours!

This is Jetpack Ride!

An arcade game where you need to reach as high as possible using your jetpack with limited fuel! How far high can you reach?

To play the game:

  • A&D - Movement (Left and Right)
  • Spacebar - Jetpack

Thank you for playing!

If you have any feedback make sure to leave it in the comments!

Happy Gaming!
